I’m Jinhao Hu, aka HuSharp*, Hu#*.

I am a first year PhD student at MPI-SWS under the supervision of Prof. Laurent Bindschaedler.

I’m interested in various fields including but not limited to: distributed system, database, and operating system. Previously I am employed at PingCAP as a Distributed Database Engineer.

I’m a lifelong learner. This site exists to document my past and accompany me on the journey forward.









* Pronounced as /huʃɑ:rp/.

* Here is an introduction to the origin of the name.

Reach me at ihusharp@gmail.com and Linkedin, also available on Github, Douban.
